front.title: Definition of P2MP PW TLV for Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping Mechanisms

abstract.t: Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping is a widely deployed Operation, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) mechanism in MPLS networks. This document describes a mechanism to verify connectivity of Point-to-Multipoint (P2MP) Pseudowires (PWs) using LSP Ping.
